title: Modern Condo for Rent
description:
Discover Modern Living at 2 David Eyer Road, Richmond Hill
Welcome to 2 David Eyer Road, Unit 728—a pristine 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo suite that has never been lived in. Situated on the 7th floor of the condo building, this residence offers a blend of comfort, convenience, and contemporary design.
Bedrooms: Step into two spacious bedrooms, providing ample room for relaxation and rest. Whether you’re a couple, a small family, or someone who enjoys having a guest room, these bedrooms offer versatility.
Bathrooms: Convenience awaits with two well-appointed bathrooms. No more morning rush—each bathroom is designed for comfort and functionality.
Balcony: Imagine stepping out onto your private balcony, where you can enjoy your morning coffee or unwind after a long day. The view from the 7th floor is nothing short of breathtaking.
Parking: Your unit includes an underground parking spot, complete with an EV charger. Sustainability meets practicality—an essential feature for modern living.

Internet: Stay connected with high-speed internet, whether you’re working from home or streaming your favorite shows.
Kitchen: The sleek quartz waterfall island in the kitchen invites culinary creativity. It’s not just a workspace; it’s a focal point for gatherings and meal preparation.
Bathrooms: Luxuriate in the chrome handheld shower and frameless sliding shower door in the primary ensuite. Plus, mirrored medicine cabinets in both bathrooms add a touch of elegance.
Countertops: Quartz countertops grace the kitchen, primary ensuite, and second bathroom, elevating the overall aesthetic.
Lighting: Under-cabinet LED lighting in the kitchen enhances both functionality and ambiance.
Location: Conveniently situated near Costco, Highway 404, and an array of restaurants, this address offers easy access to amenities and entertainment.

Business Center (Wi-Fi Building): Ideal for remote work or focused study.

title: Looking for 2 bedroom to rent !!
description:
Hi there, my name is Kyla. I am looking for a 2+ bedroom 1+ bathroom for my family.
I would like to rent either long term or short term. My family consists of my little brother (7), and my partner (21) and I (20).
We are willing to pay $2,500 if utilities are included, or $2,300 if we have to pay a percentage of utilities.
We have our paperwork and documents ready to go. We also do have a Cosigner just in case you need to feel more secure in payments as I understand we are a young couple. We have been renting and living together for 3+ years and have a reference letter from our landlord as well. We are willing to pay 3 months rent upfront because our credit is a work in progress as we just started building our credit not too long ago. We have pay stubs and employment letters.We are very quiet and clean tenants. We do have 1 Cat who is trained so the home must be pet friendly. We are also very helpful when it comes to house work such as shoveling, gardening, garbage day etc. If you have any further questions or would like to reach out to me to speak further please contact me on messages or give me a call on my cell 365-440-3558.

title: BRAND NEW 2-BEDROOM LEGAL BASEMENT UNIT WITH SEPARATE ENTRANCE
description:
Newly renovated spacious 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom basement apartment offering ~900 square feet of comfortable living space. Available to move in anytime, this unit features kitchen with stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, and laminate flooring throughout. Contact us today to book a showing!
KEY PROPERTY DETAILS:
- Type: Basement Apartment
- Bedrooms: 2
- Bathrooms: 1
- Square Footage: ~900
- Availability: Available to move in anytime
- Parking: 1 spot included.
UNIT AMENITIES:
- Newly Built: Be the first to move into this lovely unit, with modern touches and new appliances.
- Kitchen with new appliances: Cook in a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops.
- Fireplace: Stay warm with an electric fireplace (can be installed) in the living area during colder months.
- Ensuite Laundry: Convenient laundry facilities are right in the unit.
- Lots of Natural Light: Big windows let in plenty of natural light, making the space bright and welcoming.
- Open Layout: The open design gives you lots of room to make the living area your own.
BUILDING AMENITIES:
- Backyard Patio with BBQ: Enjoy outdoor cooking on the patio.
- Bike Storage: A storage unit for bicycles will be set up in the backyard this summer.
NEIGHBORHOOD:
This apartment is in a really safe and nice area called Ireland Park (near Head-on Forest & Upper Middle Rd) in Burlington, ON.
Bus Route 6 is close by. Everything you need is within a 5-15 minute drive. It's 10 minutes to McMaster University and 15 minutes to Sheridan College.

title: Apartment with free parking next to Spadina Stn - Lease Takeover
description:
Hi all,
I am looking for someone to take over my apartment lease (9 months remaining). The apartment is under rent control, so even after lease expire in 9 months, you can stay on month to month rent basis.
I was working at University of Toronto for last 2 years and have been living in this apartment since then. Due to getting a new job offer, I am required to move to a different part of Ontario.
Information about the apartment:
- Spadina Subway station entrance is literally in front of the apartment, not even 15 meters away.
- Free parking - yes this apartment has parking in the back which is not regulated. This is unheard of in downtown Toronto, however, I have been parking my car for free for last 2 years. You also have the option to park underground which is charged, however, I do not suggest parking underground and make use of free parking outside.
- This apartment is in the basement level if you taking the elevator, however, from the pictures you can see all windows are fully at the main level and all rooms are fully lit up with natural sunlight. This is the reason why this apartment is very cheap at this location and will all these amenities.
- This is a one bedroom apartment and the elevator is literally next to the apartment door, It's very convenient. The apartment has a full kitchen with new dishwasher, new huge fridge, microwave, etc., all included.
- Has a full washroom with large mirror.
- I used to live in an apartment above paying a higher rent, however, got the opportunity to get this apartment in February 2024. So there is only 9 months lease left, meaning it's kind of a short term lease with the option to keep living on month to month rent basis. Also as mentiones above, this apartment is under rent control which mean rent will not increase over the contolled rate.
Please contact me if you are interested in this apartment. I might be at work during the day, so I might only reply back in the afternoon, sorry about that.

title: Condo Unit for Rental
address: David Eyer Road, Richmond Hill, ON
description:
Discover Modern Living at 2 David Eyer Road
Welcome to 2 David Eyer Road, Unit 728! As you step into this pristine 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo suite, a sense of untouched elegance envelops you. Situated on the 7th floor of the condo building, it offers a harmonious blend of comfort, convenience, and contemporary design.
The spacious bedrooms beckon—a canvas for relaxation and versatility. Whether you’re a couple seeking intimacy, a small family, or someone who enjoys hosting guests, these rooms accommodate your lifestyle seamlessly. Imagine waking up to natural light streaming through the windows, knowing that two well-appointed bathrooms await—designed for both comfort and functionality.
But it’s the private balcony that steals the show. Step outside, and the cityscape unfolds before you. Sip your morning coffee as the sun rises, or unwind after a long day, taking in the breathtaking view from the 7th floor. Sustainability meets practicality with your underground parking spot, complete with an EV charger—a nod to modern living.
Organization becomes effortless with the dedicated storage locker. Whether it’s seasonal items or everyday essentials, you’ll find a place for everything. And let’s not forget the inclusions: high-speed internet keeps you connected, while the sleek quartz waterfall island in the kitchen becomes a culinary focal point—a gathering spot for friends and family.
Luxuriate in the chrome handheld shower and frameless sliding door in the primary ensuite. Mirrored medicine cabinets add an elegant touch. Quartz countertops grace the kitchen, primary ensuite, and second bathroom, elevating the overall aesthetic. Under-cabinet LED lighting in the kitchen enhances both functionality and ambiance.
Conveniently situated near Costco, Highway 404, and an array of restaurants, this address promises easy access to amenities and entertainment. The building amenities—like the business center (Wi-Fi-equipped), concierge services, games room, gym, and party/meeting room—complete the seamless living experience.
Don’t miss out on this fantastic opportunity! Contact us today to schedule a viewing and immerse yourself in the allure of 6 David Eyer Road.

Hazel and Juniper are loving, friendly cats. Hazel is almost 12, so she can be slow to warm up. Juniper is nearly 2 and loves everyone. I don’t think other cats would work out, but we did live with a small dog for a year and the girls got along well.
There is an elevator for this 5-floor midrise with laundry and a gym in the basement. Paid parking in a surface lot next door. ($7 per 12 hours) 5 minute walk to Lawrence Station, 15 minute walk to Yonge Eglinton.

title: Young Couple Looking to secure housing ASAP
description:
Hey! My name is Kyel, my partner Snow and I are looking to secure long term housing (1 year) near Oakville while I finish my program at Sheridan College(2025 grad).
Our budget is $2100, utilities included is preferred, max $2200. We can provide proof of income and references.
We are looking for:
- 2 bedrooms for office space to work from home when needed
- 1 bathroom is enough for us!
- we are plant lovers, so lots of natural light is preferred to keep our plants healthy after the move
- also animal lovers, so pet friendly is a must!
We aren’t allowed pets right now which is why we are looking to move into a place that allows cats and dogs to coexist
- having a yard, or access to community garden would be preferable so we can let our dog out to exercise and garden
- laundry in unit/building would be amazing
- NO BASEMENTS PLEASE ! We need an apartment with natural light ☀️
- oakville, area near sheridan college
- 1 parking spot for my car
We are hoping to find a landlord that is understanding of social issues and willing to support us as a young couple in “buying” our first “house” together.
Considering the housing market has changed a lot, this is the closest we will get to buying our own home for a while.
Having secure long-term housing will give us the opportunity to find better jobs and save up for our future.
Please start a chat with me if you have any listings available that are close to what we’re looking for. We are flexible for viewings anyday in the after-noon, feel free to let me know if we can come see your listings!

It has everything you need while staying downtown because it is walking distance to five hospitals (Toronto General, Mt. Sinai, SickKids, Princess Margaret and Women's College) and two big universities (U of T and TMU). It is also walking distance to subway stations, restaurants, shops, movie theaters, etc.

title: 2 bed 1 bath
address: King St W, Toronto, ON M6K 1E6
description:
2 bed 1 bath is available in 1350$ each with shared washroom.
immediate move in available
Room will be furnished
Utilities , amenities , co-working lounge + wifi included.
Immerse yourself in the epitome of urban luxury at LIBERTY VILLAGE, where every detail is designed for an extraordinary living experience. Revel in the stunning, unobstructed west-facing view of the iconic CN Tower, a masterpiece visible from the comfort of your new, stylish unit in the lively KING STREET WEST neighborhood. Seamless commuting becomes a daily delight with the TTC streetcar stop right outside the building, and the GO Station a 10-minute walk away, effortlessly connecting you to the vibrant city core, pristine beaches, and lush parks. Dive into a hub of activity surrounded by a diverse mix of boutiques, trendy cafes, and delectable restaurants that add a touch of excitement to your doorstep.
Located in Toronto's Liberty Village King Street West neighborhood, it is the epitome of downtown Toronto living, located only steps away from the city's best art, shopping, food, and nightlife scenes. At home, enjoy the convenience of everything you need right at your doorstep. Shopping for necessities doesn't get any easier than this, with an onsite Mc donalds , Longos Grocery Store, PetSmart, Shoppers Drug Mart, Canadian Tire, and Winners only an elevator ride away. Living at this place proves that you can have it all right at home with premium amenities, boasting a cutting-edge gym to invigorate your fitness routine and an inviting rooftop terrace to unwind against a breathtaking city backdrop. This is more than a residence; it's a unique opportunity to live where breathtaking views seamlessly merge with the dynamic heartbeat of city living. This place invites you to embrace a life where every moment is a celebration of style, comfort, and the allure of urban sophistication.

title: 1bed1bath1parking unit by Don Mills Station
description:
NO SOLICITATIONS FROM REALTORS PLEASE AND THANK YOU
TENANCY INQUIRIES ONLY
1bed 1bath 1parking spot private unit
Washer/dryer and AC/Heat as well as ammenities access
If the ad is still up the property has not been leased yet.
We are looking for a great tenant(s) to commence occupancy upon signing a 1 year lease for June 1st 2024 to May 31st 2025 with the option to renew upon request no later than 2 months before the conclusion of the signed lease.
Things one should know:
-Monthly rent does not include internet.
-Tenant(s) MUST have a renters insurance policy. (Referrals avaliable upon request)
-Tenant(s) are also responsible for covering monthly electricity usage. Bill will be forwarded by email on a monthly basis.
-Absolutely NO smoking or vaping at all.
-No parties or loud music that will disturb neighbours.
-No occupants to reside in property who are not listed as tenants on the lease.
(Short-term "friend from abroad"/weekend sleepovers are fine)
-No wallmounting TVs or drilling holes into drywall unless this is coordinated with us beforehand. (Damage to drywall will be deducted from deposit for failure to abide by set out conditions)
-Must consult before any DIY projects. Including the painting of walls or mounting of shelves and such.
Things one should have:
-Proof of income/letter of employment
-Proof of credit history i.e equifax
-Proof of identity
-Professional Reference
(no family or personal friends for reference)
-Previous landlord reference (very helpful and advantegous for positioning you as a strong candidate for tenancy but if not possible that is understandable and documented proof of timely rent payments alongside old copy of lease agreement should suffice)
-If you are a first time renter disregard landlord/rent payment reference but consider the fact that by moving ahead with an inquiry another party may be a better fit in our eyes due to the other party having the aforementioned point.
Things one should expect:
-Potential raise in rent in the event of a lease renewal at a rate at or below the set out legal limit in accordance with setout law and rent control guidelines
-We (the landlords and tenant(s)) will videotape and photograph the entirety of the unit together on our devices and agree to the final footage on each of our devices to then proceed to email each other copies of said footage for the purpose of retaining time stamped records to ensure that everyone is on the same page and that the unit is vacated in a condition that satisfies the one in which it was initially occupied upon lease commencement
-Upon approval after satisfying the outlined criteria we (the landlords) will meet in the condo management office with you (the tenant(s)) in order to have you registered. (If you have a vehicle you will need to provide the information pertaining to it to the property manager to register it with the parking spot)
-After everything is completed we will then ACCEPT AND ONLY THEN accept your first and last payment ($1750&$1750) alongside your security deposit of $500.00 in the form of an e-transfer since that will give us all a time stamped record of payment which is in everyones best interests.
To elaborate, after you sign the hardcopy of the lease (that you will be emailed in advance to review prior to signing in person in the management office since the property manager will sign the witness signature element of the lease) you will be handed the keys to the unit as well as the fob keys to the unit in the management office in exchange for the passwords to the e-transfers covering the outlined amount of the respective first/last/security deposit.
Subsequent e-transfers for the monthly rent payments are to be sent no later than the date in which the signing of the hardcopy lease and the remittance of the first e-transfer(s) takes place as planned and coordinated in the management office (fourth week of May 2024)
Thank you for your interest. Take care.

description:
Stunning, Luxury 2 Bed 1 Bath apartment in the heart of Bloor West Village, right at the gates of Baby Point. Freshly renovated, this very spacious apartment is new in every way. title: **Message or Apply Now at https://liv.rent/listings/oVNZ3YGKvW**
description: New/Modern basement apartment in a recently built, owner occupied townhouse at College and Ossington in Little Italy with a 100 walking score. This house was built to have the basement apartment rented out from the start so the design included encasing the basement apartment in special sound proofing so under normal circumstances there is zero sound transfer up or down. The apartment is complete with a/c for summer comfort and a fully heated ceramic tile floor for winter comfort (both controlled via independent thermostat) along with in suite laundry, quartz countertops and a full appliance set including a built in fridge and dishwasher. The apartment also includes a built in desk with quartz desk top and proper 8 foot ceiling height. There is a Metro grocery store 150 meters to the east and a new Pusateri's grocery store about to open 200 meters to the west and a streetcar stop 50 meters from the house so it doesn't get any better in terms of location. I'm confident that you'll be hard pressed to find a nicer basement apartment in the city. All utilities are included. You can text me on my cell if you're interested.

title: BEAUITFUL 1 BEDROOM FULLY RENOVATED DON MILLS & LAWRENCE EAST
description:
Newly renovated apartments for lease at Don Mills Road and Lawrence Avenue East located directly across from the Shops at Don Mills.
Residents of Carolyn Court will enjoy living in a feature rich apartment building that is located near transit options and amenities in North York. Living here means that you can literally step outside your door and walk across the street for dining options, groceries and nightlife options! The local library is 1 block away!
We are located in a prestigious area of North York, minutes away from the fabled Bridal Path. Located on the northwest corner of Don Mills Road & Lawrence Avenue East, we are directly across the street from the upscale Shops at Don Mills.
Carolyn Court is comprised of two low rise residential buildings with completely renovated designer suites and lobbies. All common area hallways on all floors are well lit, with brand new wallpaper and new wall to wall carpeting.
All suites are renovated and feature designer kitchens and bathrooms, gleaming hardwood floors, are freshly painted and are in “move in” condition for all new residents. Just hang up your coat and put your dishes away! Please take a moment to look at our new photo gallery section. Lockers are available for a nominal fee.
Surveillance cameras are located in the lobby and laundry rooms and are connected directly to the cable system. You can monitor activity in these areas. We take pride in providing a safe environment for our residents. Canvassers are not allowed access to our buildings.
Floor plans for all suites are available so that you can plan your furniture layout ahead of time. The buildings feature beautifully landscaped grounds, have a children’s playground area and provide visitor parking.
Rent includes water and heating. Parking is an additional $75 per month.
PRO ACTIVE COVID MEASURES All common areas of the buildings have had Germ Guard applied to all high touch surface areas. Every suite had been thoroughly disinfected with lysol and bleach before a new resident occupancy twice over. Please feel free to view our website www.rentindonmills.com
See the residential unit here:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmxJ3fOyO9eaAHmPYBIJ9XQ

title: Condo for Rent - 286 Main Street Toronto
description:
**Welcome to 286 Main Street, Toronto – A Blend of Luxury, Convenience, and Community!**
Experience the height of urban living at 286 Main Street, where luxury, comfort, and practicality converge. This exquisite condo offers a master bedroom, a versatile den styled as a second bedroom, and two full bathrooms, making it perfect for professionals, couples, and small families.
The modern kitchen comes equipped with high-end appliances and extends into a spacious living area, ideal for entertaining or unwinding. Outside, dual terraces feature BBQ stations and cozy lounge seating, providing a wonderful setting for social gatherings or serene evenings.
For families, the indoor kids' play area ensures year-round entertainment, while health enthusiasts will appreciate the fitness center, complete with a yoga studio. Pet owners will love the convenience of an on-site pet grooming station, making it easy to care for furry friends.
Professionals working from home can thrive in the dedicated technology lounge, and utilize the boardrooms and meeting rooms for collaborative projects or client meetings.
Storage and transportation are a breeze with a large bicycle locker available for residents, and with Danforth GO Station and Main Street TTC Station just a two-minute walk away, commuting is incredibly convenient.
The neighborhood is vibrant with diverse restaurants offering global cuisines and highly rated public schools, enriching the community feel.
Additional amenities at 286 Main Street include:
- Dual terraces with BBQ stations and outdoor lounge seating
- Indoor children’s play area
- Comprehensive fitness center with a yoga studio
- Dedicated technology lounge, boardrooms, and meeting rooms
- Pet grooming station for your beloved pets
- Large bicycle locker for cycling enthusiasts
- 24-hour security and concierge services
- Residents’ lounge for private events
Make 286 Main Street your new home and embrace a lifestyle of unparalleled convenience and luxury. Contact us today to schedule your viewing.
**For more information, please reach out!

title: Room on Upper Floor - Lawrence Park
description:
OFFERING: one unfurnished bedroom in a charming, upper floor apartment in Lawrence Park. It features a great linear kitchen with a dishwasher and stainless steel appliances. There is a small deck off of the dining room and private laundry machine in the basement.
The Room: One private room in a 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment for a one year lease starting April or May 1st, 2024 (option to extend month to month after).
Price: $1,300/month included utilities, cable and wifi.
Location: Duplex and Chatsworth, an 8-10 min walk to Lawrence station, 25 min transit to Union Station and 15-20 min walk to Yonge/Eglinton.
Lease terms: Offlease, 1 year agreement - an agreement to be signed by you - beginning April or May 1st, 2024. Rent will be paid to me.
Rent Control: Unit was used for residential purposes prior to Nov 2018.
What is your relationship to the unit: Leaseholder looking to rent 1 unfurnished bedroom, finding a replacement for roommate and you would be living with just me.
REQUIRED DOCUMENTS for application: Proof of income (or co-signer for students), landlord and personal references, first and last month's rent, photo ID.
Additional information: I WFH most days but am usually coming and going due to the nature of my job. I love to cook/bbq, play board games and stay active. I like to host friends here and there as well. Looking for a roommate who is clean, friendly, professional and content to have their own thing going on - super open to have roomie hangouts and cook together. title: Seeking 1 Bedroom Apartment Whitby/Oshawa
description:
Hello! My name is Julia, and myself and my partner are seeking a 1 bedroom/bachelor apartment for May or June in Whitby/Oshawa. We are two adult women who are quiet, clean, and responsible tenants. We can provide ample landlord and employer references and are happy to provide credit/background checks at your request.
We are both employed full-time-- myself as a Baker and herself as a Personal Support Worker. In our spare time we both enjoy cooking/baking, reading, and spending lots of time outdoors.
We have 2 pets-- a cat and a rabbit who are well-mannered and clean. We also both have a car, ideally two parking spots would be suitable for our living arrangement. Preferably looking for $1300-1500/month with utilities included, but willing to be flexible.
Both of us hold high importance out of taking care of our spaces and making them feel like home. We are hopeful to find a comfortable and quiet place we can call our first home together! Hopefully in getting to know us some, you can see us as ideal tenants for your space. Please do not hesitate to reach out via this ad or cell phone provided. Looking forward to meeting you!
